ygData.subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson continues to rely on his sonar systems while in his vehicle mode.  His tires roll over the ground slowly as bits of debris and gravel crumble beneath

Tucson continues to rely on his sonar systems while in his vehicle mode.  H=
is tires roll over the ground slowly as bits of debris and gravel crumble b=
eneath their treads.  Lucky for everyone and himself, his engine was silent=
 enough to go un detected and at his present speed, not much noise was foll=
owing the roll of his tires.  The ping was bouncing off more and more and g=
etting louder to him.  He keeps on his present course, then stops a moment,=
 as the ping veers slightly to the right.  He pivots his tires and rolls sl=
owly in that direction, following the reverberations to the letter.  All th=
e while, keeping his speed down to five miles per hour.  He knew about movi=
ng cautiously.  It was what saved him in battle up to the point where he tr=
ied to do something beyond his physical capabilities, while acting as a dec=
oy to the Decepticons to try and lure them away from his comrades.  He was =
thinking of that moment now.  What if it were to be a repeat of that day?  =


Again he comes to a careful stop.  He keeps reminding himself to remain c=
autious because what was out there now, was completely unknown.

" I copy y=
our transmission Lord Perseus.  I'm not sure as to what we're dealing with,=
 but something or someone is out here.  We're proceeding with caution and I=
'm trying to avoid using any of my directional lights because just one hint=
 of light could give our position away to a hostile enemy. We will keep you=
 posted if we discover anything new."

The ping comes on strong.  And enoug=
h to startle Tucson again.  He jumps out of SUV mode and back into robot mo=
de, with his cross bow in hand.

" That was a little too close for comfort.=
  Ravenchief, Guardia, do you see anything I may be missing?  Anything at a=
ll?"
